type1_missing.reasoning: Middleware configuration completely missing - no middleware file exists to protect /dashboard routes, check session cookies, or redirect authenticated users visiting login/register
POST /api/auth/logout endpoint not implemented - logout directory exists but contains no route.ts file
Empty state message 'No tasks yet. Add your first task above!' not displayed in TaskList component when tasks array is empty
Email validation function with regex /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/ not implemented - only HTML5 type='email' validation exists

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Session cookie name is 'session' instead of specified 'todo-session'
Error responses use simple format { error: 'message' } instead of specified format with code and message fields { error: { code: 'ERROR_CODE', message: 'Human-readable message' } }
Database transaction functions clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, and toggleAllTasks are not wrapped in db.transaction() as specified for atomic bulk operations
Code uses 'any' type in database functions (lines 97 and 127), violating specification requirement to avoid using any type
Dashboard displays hardcoded 'User' name instead of actual user's name from session (comment on line 41: 'Mock user data for now')
Logout redirects to /login instead of homepage (/) as specified in step 11 of primary flow

type3_extraneous.reasoning: CSV export endpoint GET /api/export not mentioned in specification's API endpoints section (6.1-6.2)
Utility file with cn() helper function not mentioned in specification's file structure section (7)
